author: mrcryptorino
content: Hi guys. last week my average daily Hashrate has been decreasing a lot! and im receiving a lot less eth while i mine the same time as always. Whats the problem???

author: mrcryptorino
content: so this involve every minner? Cause i been looking if in these two weeks someone was having same issue and i dont found anyone

author: turbinezach
content: from what I know, every miner will be affected by that
